text:
Rails jedi | Doutore.com | Rio de Janeiro, Brazil | Remote | Part-time

Doutore is an EMR software company focused on the Brazilian Market. We're bootstraped and we currently have hundreds of active users.

We're looking for an expert in Ruby on Rails to help us with some key challenges. We're looking for probably 10-hour week max.

email me: rails [at) doutore com
